overview: With this stunning visual journey set to music, viewers will take a thrilling helicopter ride over Las Vegas, flying over Red Rock Canyon, the Valley of Fire, Hoover Dam and Lake Mead, followed by a virtual road trip along the world-famous Strip. Viewers can select from two discrete musical styles -- New Age melodic or a movie score orchestral track -- with each serving as a perfect accompaniment to the breathtaking scenery.
title: Dreaming Nevada
